page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: and sport centre in East Kilbride and also for shopping expeditions to the very large shopping centre there. There were very few users of the A.S.D.A.bus on our survey which was spread over all parts of the village but as the bus is kept running weekly we think it must be well used perhaps by these local people without cars On our survey of 122 families spread over the village there were only 3 without cars. 48 families had two cars and about 6 had 3 or more.Of these 98 families had at least one company car. These which had second cars used them a lot to carry their children to their various activities.There is a petrol station in the village.Much of the petrol is sold on company accounts.There are numerous motor repair shops in our area.
